title: Need help..
body:
I was just about to begin loading into an aram game.. When the client suddenly crashed. So i opened it back up moments later and i get a message saying my client has been reverted to an earlier patch?? and that it will update... nothing happens though, so i try to log in, i get username/password wrong error... However my user/pass is not wrong, i can still log into the site/forums with the same password. What do i do? should i "repair" client ?

I've tried restarting the client and my PC multiple times..

replies.body:
Try setting up your permissions if you haven't already then run a client repair https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

If that doesn't fix then run a clean install through the Hextech Repair Tool https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
